subject: Delays (Transportation)
Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants (9-4) have a short week before playing Michael Vick and Philadelphia (9-4) in a game that could determine the winner of the N.F.C. East.
snippet: The Giants (9-4) have a short week before playing Michael Vick and Philadelphia (9-4) in a game that could determine the winner of the N.F.C. East.
